bad_bcd_queries.explanation: No BCD data for query: api.HTMLElement.cancel_event

title: HTMLElement: cancel event
summary: The cancel event is fired by <input> and <dialog> elements. The event is fired when the user cancels the currently open dialog by closing it with the Esc key. It is also fired by the file input when the user cancels the file picker dialog via the Esc key or the cancel button and when the user re-selects the same files that were previously selected.
pageTitle: HTMLElement: cancel event - Web APIs | MDN
